about_the_game:
Greetings, heir of Rodovia. Are you ready to claim your rightful throne? If so, know this - ruling a fantasy kingdom is no easy feat. Welcome to the Crown of Greed, a classic strategy game inspired by old-school traditions, featuring a unique indirect command system, so unusual among other strategy games.

Try your hand as a ruler

Plan, build and expand your own fantasy kingdom, filling it with a variety of upgradable buildings. Choose from a wide range of economic facilities, workshops, military buildings, and hero dwellings to secure the safety and well-being of your people. Their gratitude will come in the form of generous taxes, only yours to use.

Will they agree to serve you?

Heroes, endowed with free will, will gladly undertake your quests... or not! You can't force them to obey you, but you can try to buy their services with shiny coins. Remember, that each of the hero classes are specialized in different types of missions - whether it's scouting, destroying enemies' habitats, defending the city or fighting specific foes.

Realms inspired by European medieval folk culture await

Travel through the gloomy, mysterious lands of Rodovia to strengthen your rule. Discover a variety of biomes, such as dense Forests, Deathlands, Swamps, Icelands or Plains, each with their own locations and horrifying inhabitants. Visit forgotten ruins, caves, graveyards or dens and remember - with great risk comes great reward.

No more direct orders

Discover that authority extends beyond mere commands, and that a King's power is only as strong as his ability to bend others to his will. Your subjects and independent heroes will decide for themselves which of the tasks they want to perform first - good planning is therefore one of the keys to your success!

- Unusual RTS gameplay with indirect management solutions

- Engaging Orders system, which may or may not influence your subjects and heroes

- Opportunity to build and expand your own fantasy foothold

- Dynamic Combat and Magic systems

- The majestic in-game world, inspired by European medieval folk culture and mythology

- An upgradable city-hub that players can visit between missions System Requirements

name: Crown of Greed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 970 4GB or Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Forget about direct orders you know from other games of the genre. Master an unusual, indirect management system in which you must skillfully bend your subjects and heroes to your will. Claim the throne of Rodovia, build cities, recruit troops, expand your kingdom and exploit the power of a coin.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
